m_szDocTitle: AK Steel Holding's CEO Discusses Q1 2014 Results - Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: AK Steel Holding's CEO Discusses Q1 2014 Results - Earnings Call Transcript Apr. 22, 2014  4:30 PM ET | AK Steel Holding Corporation (NYSE: AKS ) Q1 2014 Earnings Conference Call April 22, 2014 11:00 AM ET Executives Douglas O. Mitterholzer – Assistant Treasurer James L. Wainscott – Chairman, Chief Executive Officer, President and Member of Proxy Committee Roger K. Newport – Chief Financial Officer and Vice President of Finance Analysts Sal Tharani – Goldman Sachs & Co. Brett M. Levy – Jefferies LLC Evan L. Kurtz – Morgan Stanley & Co. LLC Timna Tanners – Bank of America Merrill Lynch, Researc
